flavor_text_entries.gold:
Once it catches
the wind, it deft­
ly controls its cotton-puff spores
to float, even
around the world.
flavor_text_entries.silver:
Drifts on seasonal
winds and spreads
its cotton-like spores all over
the world to make
more offspring.
flavor_text_entries.crystal:
Even in the fierc­
est wind, it can
control its fluff to make its way to
any place in the
world it wants.
flavor_text_entries.ruby:
JUMPLUFF rides warm southern winds to
cross the sea and fly to foreign lands.
The POKéMON descends to the ground when it encounters cold air while it is
floating.
flavor_text_entries.sapphire:
JUMPLUFF rides warm southern winds to
cross the sea and fly to foreign lands.
The POKéMON descends to the ground when it encounters cold air while it is
floating.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
JUMPLUFF ride warm southern winds to
cross the sea and fly to foreign lands.
This POKéMON lands when it encounters
cold air while it is floating.
flavor_text_entries.firered:
It drifts on seasonal winds and spreads
its cotton-like spores all over the world 
to make more offspring.
flavor_text_entries.leafgreen:
Once it catches the wind, it deftly
controls its cotton-puff spores to float,
even around the world.
flavor_text_entries.diamond:
Blown by seasonal winds, it
circles the globe, scattering
cotton spores as it goes.
flavor_text_entries.pearl:
Blown by seasonal winds, it
circles the globe, scattering
cotton spores as it goes.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
Blown by seasonal winds, it
circles the globe, scattering
cotton spores as it goes.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold:
Once it catches the wind, it deftly
controls its cotton-puff spores--
it can even float around the world.

Drifts on seasonal winds and spreads
its cotton-like spores all over
the world to make more offspring.

flavor_text_entries.y:
Even in the fiercest wind, it can control its fluff to
make its way to any place in the world it wants.
flavor_text_entries.omega-ruby:
Jumpluff rides warm southern winds to cross the sea and fly to
foreign lands. The Pokémon descends to the ground when it
encounters cold air while it is floating.
flavor_text_entries.alpha-sapphire:
Jumpluff rides warm southern winds to cross the sea and fly to
foreign lands. The Pokémon descends to the ground when it
encounters cold air while it is floating.
